title: Star Wars: The Force Unleashed II
description: The Games on Demand version supports  English, French, Italian, German, Spanish.  Betrayed by Darth Vader for the last time, Starkiller has escaped and faces a new journey to find his true identity. Unleash fury – wield dual lightsabers and new force powers to crush your enemies. Unleash truth – sequel to the award-winning story, continue the epic Star Wars saga.

contentRating.label: T (Teen)
disclaimers: Online Interactions Not Rated by the ESRB

childDownloads.title: Star Wars: The Force Unleashed II

Betrayed by Darth Vader for the last time, Starkiller has escaped and faces a new journey to find his true identity. Unleash fury – wield dual lightsabers and new force powers to crush your enemies. childDownloads.title: The Force Unleashed II - "Combat" Web Doc
childDownloads.description: Enjoy an exclusive look at how the spectacular, over-the-top Force combat has improved and gotten even bigger in Star Wars®: The Force Unleashed™ II.  See the brand-new dual Lightsaber fighting style, unique Force powers and "Force Fury" mode, and learn how the LucasArts team improved the game's combat system for the most fun and unleashed game experience ever.  Unleash Truth on October 26.

childDownloads.title: Star Wars: The Force Unleashed II
childDownloads.description: Experience the explosive action and engrossing story in the brand-new demo for Star Wars®: The Force Unleashed II™.  Assuming the role of Starkiller, players go to the iconic clone planet Kamino and come face-to-face with the Ultimate Dark Lord, Darth Vader.   Prepare to use even bigger powers and new dual lightsaber moves to survive an onslaught of enemies  in the epic saga that is Star Wars: The Force Unleashed II.  Unleash Truth in the full game on October 26.

childDownloads.title: The Force Unleashed II - E3 Trailer
childDownloads.description: The saga continues as Starkiller, Darth Vader’s fugitive apprentice, returns and is unleashed into a world of epic conflict and ultimate betrayal. Against overwhelming odds, his destiny is unclear – but with explosive Force powers and dual lightsabers, he creates a path of destruction on a scale never before seen in the Star Wars universe. Prepare to be Unleashed on October 26, 2010.

childDownloads.title: The Force Unleashed II - Launch Trailer
childDownloads.description: See the game and in action in the gameplay trailer. Learn more about the brand new story and experience the explosive powers of Star Wars®: The Force Unleashed™ II in the epic, new Launch Gameplay Trailer.  Set between the two Star Wars movie trilogies, the saga continues as Starkiller, Darth Vader's fugitive apprentice, embarks on a dark, thrilling journey of self-discovery and even bigger, over-the-top action. Unleash Truth on October 26.

childDownloads.title: The Force Unleashed II - "Snow"
childDownloads.description: See the over-the-top Force powers and new dual lightsaber action of Star Wars: The Force Unleashed II.  Starkiller, Darth Vader’s fugitive apprentice, embarks on a journey of thrilling self-discovery that includes unleashing Force Fury on an army of Storm Troopers, and a face-off with his old master, Darth Vader.  Unleash Truth October 26.

childDownloads.title: The Force Unleashed II - "Story" Web Doc
childDownloads.description: Get the inside story on the brand-new story for Star Wars®: The Force Unleashed ™ II.  Created by the award-winning minds of the original game, the franchise's sequel again takes place in the rich time period set between the two Star Wars movie trilogies.  Discover how Star Wars®: The Force Unleashed™ II's story, and the game's hero Starkiller, Darth Vader's secret apprentice, have evolved in a darker, more personal narrative.  Unleash Truth on October 26.

childDownloads.title: The Force Unleashed II - "Superhero" Web Doc
childDownloads.description: Discover the truth and inspiration behind Starkiller, Darth Vader's secret apprentice and hero of the Star Wars: The Force Unleashed franchise.  Learn about Starkiller's story and how it has evolved from the first game to the sequel, Star Wars®: The Force Unleashed ™ II.  This web documentary provides unique insight into how the authors of this award winning story developed the characters, conceived the plot lines and re-envisioned the Force in an incredible way to deliver an action game experience for all fans to enjoy.  Unleash Truth on October 26.

childDownloads.title: The Force Unleashed II - "Walls"
childDownloads.description: See the true power of the Force in Star Wars®: The Force Unleashed™ II as Starkiller, Darth Vader’s fugitive apprentice, unleashes explosive Force moves in an unforgettable, epic showdown with the Lord of the Sith himself.  Unleash Truth October 26.

childDownloads.title: The Force Unleashed II DLC Sizzle
childDownloads.description: The saga continues as Starkiller unleashes his signature Force powers and devastating dual lightsaber combat in the new downloadable Endor Bonus Mission. See what happens if Starkiller, Darth Vader’s fugitive apprentice, returned to the dark side on a mission to bring down the Rebellion on the iconic planet of Endor. Available for download on December 15th for only 80 points, players can experience Starkiller’s  powers as the menacingly powerful dark apprentice. All ewoks will be harmed!

childDownloads.title: Star Wars®: The Force Unleashed™ II Premium Theme
childDownloads.description: Unleash Truth. Outfit your dashboard and friends list with this Star Wars®: The Force Unleashed™ II Premium Theme Pack.

childDownloads.title: Starkiller Combat Gear
childDownloads.description: Starkiller, Darth Vader's now fugitive apprentice, is on a journey to discover his identity and to reunite with his one true love, Juno Eclipse.

childDownloads.title: Starkiller Jedi Hunter Costume
childDownloads.description: Unleash your inner dark side and dress as the dark clone of Starkiller featured in The Force Unleashed II’s The Battle of Endor downloadable mission pack.

childDownloads.title: Starkiller's Dual Lightsabers
childDownloads.description: Starkiller's signature weapons as featured in The Force Unleashed II.

childDownloads.title: Terror Trooper Armor
childDownloads.description: A highly lethal experimental Imperial unit that has the ability to teleport.  These deadly units were created by Darth Vader and given to Boba Fett to help track down Juno Eclipse and Starkiller.

childDownloads.title: Terror Trooper Armor
childDownloads.description: A highly lethal experimental Imperial unit that has the ability to teleport.  These deadly units were created by Darth Vader and given to Boba Fett to help track down Juno Eclipse and Starkiller.

childDownloads.title: Star Wars The Force Unleashed II - Endor DLC
childDownloads.description: Continue your adventure as the Dark Apprentice, where you can forever change the history of the Star Wars Universe by executing Darth Vader’s orders to crush the Rebels as they mount their assault on Endor.

childDownloads.title: Star Wars The Force Unleashed II Character Pack
childDownloads.description: Download additional content for Star Wars: The Force Unleashed II in this new character costume pack that will allow you to play as your favorite Star Wars characters, including Luke Skywalker in Dagobah Training Gear, Obi-Wan Kenobi in Clone Wars Battle Armor, Darth Malak, Han Solo, Lando Calrissian, Admiral Ackbar as well as new costumes for Starkiller.
